seo.title: Industrial Automation Services | PLC SCADA DCS Installation & Maintenance | Powerton Engineering India
seo.description: Comprehensive industrial automation and electrical engineering services across India - PLC SCADA DCS installation, control panel commissioning, NABL calibration, instrumentation testing, 24/7 technical support, custom automation solutions, training, and solar EPC services. ISO certified company serving pharmaceutical, power plant, oil & gas, manufacturing industries. Expert in Siemens, Allen Bradley, Schneider automation. Free consultation available.
seo.keywords: industrial automation services India, PLC installation services, SCADA commissioning, DCS installation, control panel installation, automation system integration, electrical commissioning services, instrumentation calibration NABL, instrument testing services, process automation services, industrial maintenance services, automation technical support 24/7, custom automation solutions, MCC panel installation, PCC commissioning, VFD installation, HMI programming services, automation training courses, PLC SCADA training, solar EPC services India, renewable energy installation, automation consulting services, control system design, electrical engineering services, turnkey automation projects, factory automation services, plant automation solutions, industrial IoT installation, Industry 4.0 services, predictive maintenance services, remote monitoring setup, SCADA migration services, DCS upgrade services, control panel retrofitting, automation modernization, electrical design services, power distribution installation, motor control center setup, automation project management, industrial electrical contractor, process control installation, pharmaceutical automation services, power plant commissioning, oil and gas automation services, chemical plant automation, water treatment automation, manufacturing automation services

descriptions.installation-commissioning: Professional installation and commissioning services for electrical panels (MCC, PCC), PLC, DCS, SCADA systems and industrial equipment.
descriptions.calibration-testing: National Accreditation Board for Testing and Calibration Laboratories-certified precision calibration and testing services for pressure, temperature, flow instruments, control systems, plus comprehensive preventive and emergency maintenance services for electrical systems and industrial automation equipment.
descriptions.technical-support: 24/7 technical support services with remote diagnostics, on-site troubleshooting, and emergency response.
descriptions.custom-solutions: Tailored engineering solutions for unique industrial needs, including customized MCC panels, automation systems, and process control solutions.
descriptions.consultation-training: Expert technical consultation and hands-on training programs for PLC programming, HMI development, and industrial automation.
descriptions.supply-chain-management: Comprehensive supply chain management for electrical components and spare parts. Authorized distributor network ensures genuine parts.
descriptions.solar-epc: Full-service Solar Engineering, Procurement, and Construction services for 1kW to 1MW+ projects. 25-year performance guarantee with Ministry of New and Renewable Energy-approved designs.

technicalSupport.overview: 24/7 technical support services for troubleshooting, remote assistance, and on-site support with quick response times for all electrical and automation systems.
benefits: Quick response times for critical issues

installationCommissioning.overview: Complete installation and commissioning services for industrial automation systems, electrical panels, and equipment, with professional certification and testing.

calibrationTesting.overview: National Accreditation Board for Testing and Calibration Laboratories-certified precision calibration and testing services for pressure, temperature, flow instruments, and control systems, combined with comprehensive preventive and emergency maintenance services for electrical systems and industrial automation equipment designed to minimize downtime and ensure operational efficiency.
benefits: National Accreditation Board for Testing and Calibration Laboratories certified calibration services
Preventive maintenance programs that prevent failures

customSolutions.overview: Tailored engineering solutions for unique industrial needs, including customized MCC panels, automation systems, and process control solutions that address specific operational challenges.
benefits: MCC panels customized for specific needs
End-to-end solutions from design to implementation

consultationTraining.overview: Expert technical consultation and hands-on training programs for PLC programming, HMI development, and industrial automation that enhance technical capabilities and ensure knowledge transfer.
benefits: Expert training in Programmable Logic Controller programming
Consultation in system design and architecture
Instrumentation Systems and Automation Society certified modules

supplyChainManagement.overview: Comprehensive supply chain management for electrical components and spare parts. Authorized distributor network ensures genuine parts and maintains operational continuity with quick delivery.
benefits: Genuine parts only from authorized distributors
Quick delivery service for immediate needs

solarEpc.overview: Full-service Solar Engineering, Procurement, and Construction services for 1kW to 1MW+ projects. 25-year performance guarantee with Ministry of New and Renewable Energy-approved designs and complete grid connection assistance.
benefits: Ministry of New and Renewable Energy approved designs and engineering
Complete grid connection and net metering assistance
Full service from project management to commissioning
